docs.abstract: The race in Louisville ran with a smaller field than usual, no spectators and in spite of nearby protests over the police killing of Breonna Taylor in the city earlier this year.
docs.snippet: The race in Louisville ran with a smaller field than usual, no spectators and in spite of nearby protests over the police killing of Breonna Taylor in the city earlier this year.
docs.lead_paragraph: LOUISVILLE, Ky. — No one really expected a horse race.

headline.main: Authentic Wins the Kentucky Derby, Run Without Fans
headline.print_headline: Authentic Thwarts Tiz the Law’s Triple Crown Bid

docs.abstract: Hillary Clinton delivered an unused election speech. Jennifer Aniston cried at Central Perk. It was a year for watching celebrities reinhabit their past selves.
docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton delivered an unused election speech. Jennifer Aniston cried at Central Perk. It was a year for watching celebrities reinhabit their past selves.
docs.lead_paragraph: MasterClass, an online platform where you can watch famous people deliver video tutorials for $180 a year, recently debuted a course on the topic of resilience. It begins with a close-up shot of a weathered oval desk. We hear papers shuffling, birds chirping, the voices of an ethereal choir. A woman’s hands drift across a policy document. As white light flares through a garden window, Hillary Clinton appears. She wears a serene smile and a magenta blouse. It feels like she’s back from the dead.

docs.abstract: Trump pitched himself as pro-police, but when his mob stormed the Capitol, he fell silent.
docs.snippet: Trump pitched himself as pro-police, but when his mob stormed the Capitol, he fell silent.
docs.lead_paragraph: Civilizations require rules because they require order.

docs.abstract: Unilever, which owns brands like Dove and Sunsilk, said a study had found that the word “normal” makes most people feel excluded. A spokeswoman said it would remove it from more than 200 products.
docs.snippet: Unilever, which owns brands like Dove and Sunsilk, said a study had found that the word “normal” makes most people feel excluded. A spokeswoman said it would remove it from more than 200 products.
docs.lead_paragraph: The beauty and personal-care company Unilever said on Tuesday that it would no longer use the word “normal” on its products or in its advertising, after a study revealed that it makes most people feel excluded.

headline.main: Maker of Dove Soap Will Drop the Word ‘Normal’ From Beauty Products
headline.print_headline: A Personal-Care Giant Promises to Challenge ‘Narrow Beauty Ideals’

docs.abstract: An apologetic police chief said the bomb squad had determined the explosives to weigh 16.5 pounds without using a scale. Investigators found the weight was over 42 pounds.
docs.snippet: An apologetic police chief said the bomb squad had determined the explosives to weigh 16.5 pounds without using a scale. Investigators found the weight was over 42 pounds.
docs.lead_paragraph: Los Angeles police bomb technicians attempting to safely dispose of 42 pounds of illegal fireworks they seized at a home in June vastly underestimated the weight of the explosives before their armored containment vessel was breached by a powerful blast, a contrite police chief announced Monday.

headline.main: Los Angeles Police Underestimated Weight of Fireworks Before Blast That Hurt 17
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Police Erred on Weight of Fireworks in Blast That Injured 17

docs.abstract: From infectious hip-hop and big-band songs to a mix for transgender and nonbinary children, releases during the pandemic have something for everyone.
docs.snippet: From infectious hip-hop and big-band songs to a mix for transgender and nonbinary children, releases during the pandemic have something for everyone.
docs.lead_paragraph: Music for children is often dismissed as either simple and silly or simple and soporific. It doesn’t have to be. A whole world exists beyond “The Wheels on the Bus” and “Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star,” and it has expanded during the pandemic, as musicians have found themselves at home with ample recording time. One artist released an album offering a vicarious global voyage, while others undertook projects with their own housebound families.

headline.main: 7 Albums for Kids That Adults Will Want to Hear, Too
headline.print_headline: Children’s Albums That Also Please Adult Ears

docs.abstract: Readers discuss the rise in death threats and calls for bloodshed. Also: Senator Sinema; gerrymandered districts; immigration; Somalia.
docs.snippet: Readers discuss the rise in death threats and calls for bloodshed. Also: Senator Sinema; gerrymandered districts; immigration; Somalia.

headline.main: Threats of Violence in Today’s Political Discourse
headline.print_headline: Threats of Violence in Political Discourse

docs.abstract: These 8 movies were written, directed by and star people of color, and depict complex stories that can spark conversation.
docs.snippet: These 8 movies were written, directed by and star people of color, and depict complex stories that can spark conversation.
docs.lead_paragraph: For parents trying to figure out how to talk to their children about racism, film can be a useful tool for generating empathy. But many family-friendly movies with diverse casts are told from a white perspective, for a white audience. That can rob people of color of their turns as the hero, nullifying their voices. And the stories are usually about racism, presenting the issue as a problem to be solved, wrapping up in a neat resolution.

headline.main: Family-Friendly Movies Made by Diverse Filmmakers
headline.print_headline: Program a Festival Of Diverse Films For the Family

docs.abstract: Pretty Yende, an acclaimed soprano, says she was forced to submit to a body search at a Paris airport. “I felt stripped of my human dignity,” she said.
docs.snippet: Pretty Yende, an acclaimed soprano, says she was forced to submit to a body search at a Paris airport. “I felt stripped of my human dignity,” she said.
docs.lead_paragraph: The South African soprano Pretty Yende expected her visit this week to France, where she is starring in a production of Bellini’s “La Sonnambula,” to be relatively uneventful.

headline.main: South African Opera Star Says She Was Mistreated by French Police
headline.print_headline: An Opera Star Accuses the French Police
